name: places/ChIJm5wkmK9ZwokR-ph9BLX1S2c
formattedAddress: 171 W 29th St, New York, NY 10001, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Albert Compres Dominicano hasta la tambora

adrFormatAddress: 171 W 29th St, New York, NY 10001-5100, USA

editorialSummary.text: This pint-size shop has been selling hand-rolled cigars since 1974 & offers customized bands.

originalText.text:
Great place to grab a phenomenal hand rolled smoke.  I tried The Pasion, a full bodied smoke with a smooth flavor and stays cool throughout the smoke.

Jesus and the folks at Martinez are extremely hospitable and if you have the time, I highly recommend sitting in for a while and enjoying some conversation.

I will definitely be back to pick up a few more before the year is out.

text.text:

originalText.text:
This was my second visit to Martinez Handmade Cigars, and once again, it proved to be a delightful experience. The cozy ambiance of the small store immediately transports you to another world, creating an atmosphere perfect for enjoying exceptional cigars. The walls adorned with photos and paintings depicting people savoring cigars add to the old-school charm.

Despite my limited knowledge about cigars, the staff at Martinez exhibited an impressive depth of expertise and patience while guiding me through their diverse selection. It was evident that their passion for cigars extended beyond a mere job, as they took the time to assist in selecting the perfect cigar flavor, showcasing remarkable attention to detail.

The exceptional customer service further enhanced my visit. If you ever find yourself in the city craving a top-notch cigar experience, Martinez Handmade Cigars is an absolute must-visit that guarantees satisfaction.

originalText.text: Martinez Handmade Cigars is the absolute BEST! John and Jesus were incredibly helpful, knowledgeable, and patient when picking out and designing cigar bands for our wedding. The cigar rollers were undoubtedly one of the biggest hits of our wedding – friends & family still talk and rave about them to this day! If the fact that there were no cigars at the end of the night isn’t a testament to the quality of these cigars, we’re not quite sure what else would be. We even worked with Jesus & John following the wedding to order more of our wedding cigars. Overall, high quality cigars for a great price from genuine people. Thanks to the whole team at Martinez for making our wedding extra special & memorable. Looking forward to working with you guys again!

originalText.text: I noticed Martinez's Handmade Cigars when I was coming out of a meeting. Stopped by to check them out. Counter man was very friendly, knowledgeable, and happy to discuss their product. Rollers were making cigars as I came in. Most importantly, great smoke and great value for an artisanal product.

originalText.text: As a smoker of top shelf cigar brands, I can confidently say this store’s products are a hidden gem. Smooth pulls, delicious flavours and most importantly genuine, good people!! Mad respect!
